thread.title: Beautiful tree cottages in tree house resort Jaipur (RenuSingh)
thread.title_full: Beautiful tree cottages in tree house resort Jaipur (RenuSingh)

title: Beautiful tree cottages in tree house resort Jaipur (RenuSingh)
text: By RenuSingh Sep 29, 2015 Tree House Resort, Jaipur is the only natural tree house resort in town lending a peaceful and close to nature experience to its guests. This acclaimed resort is located amidst hills, forests and streams. It provides an ideal setting for a unique experienceLocation:Tree House Resort is located opposite Amity University, Jaipur. Hotel Feature:Tree House Resort is a wonderful lodging venue for leisure travelers. The resort is fully equipped with all contemporary and recreational facilities like swimming pool, billiard room and golf course. Room service, internet, gym, 24-hour front desk, air conditioning, conference facilities, non-smoking rooms, parking, shopping, travel desk, wheel chair access, 24-hour security, bus parking, catering services, cocktail lounge, concierge, game room, gift shop, in room movies, lounge, massage services, outlet adapters, video game player, wedding services, banquet facilities, doctor on call, audio visual equipment, LCD/projector, board room and meeting rooms are some of the facilities provided. Camel ride and jungle safari can be arranged on prior request of the tourists. The Hotel has a tree-house restaurant, Machaan which serves a combination of Indian and international cuisine and The Peacock bar flaunting delicately engraved interiors featuring peacocks and elephants of the Mughal era.Rooms:Rooms available at Tree House Resort are Luxury cottage, Deluxe and Private Suite. The cottages are made of wood and balanced upon tree trunks. Basic room amenities are, hair dryer, internet access, iron, mini bar, newspaper, private bathroom, refrigerator, bath tub, bathrobe, bedside lamp, ceiling fan, complimentary mineral water bottle, DVD player, flat-screen TV, full length mirror, hangers, in room heating, in-room menu, in-room safe, laundry bag, luggage space, rollaway bed, table lamp, tea/coffee maker, temp control, turn down service, windows open, Wi-Fi access on charge, wooden flooring and writing desk.Tree House Resort is a budget property, located at 4.6 kms from Achrol New Bus Stand. Tree House Resort is set in the untouched and amazing natural ambiance of the Syari valley, with a view of the majestic Aravallis. The property offers lawns/garden, activity center, games room, babysitting service, gymnasium, outdoor activities, dining hall, bar, doctor on call, golf course, travel desk, central heating, airport transfer, parking, library, guide service, bonfire, room service (12 hours) and bicycles on hire. Recreational activities include swimming pool, kids pool, sun beds (pool) and massage center. Chargeable facility include Wi-Fi internet access, taxi service, railway station transfer, sightseeing and jungle safari. In room amenities include air conditioner, satellite television, intercom, refrigerator, iron/ironing board (on request), study table, daily newspaper, safe deposit locker, electronic safe, room heater, shower area, hot/cold water and bathroom toiletries Guests can relish a number of dishes at the in-house restaurant that features pleasant ambience and a wide range of mouthwatering foods. Ideal for social and corporate gatherings, the resort has well-appointed conference and meeting rooms backed by a host of facilities that use state-of-art technology, ideal for a business presentations. The convenient site of this property makes it easy for the visitors to access popular places like Sheesh Mahal, Panna Meena ka Kund, Amber Fort, Elefantastic, City Palace-Jaipur and Hawa Mahal. Nearest airport is Jaipur International Airport (46.1 kms) and railway station is Jaipur Railway Station (37.9 kms). About the Author Christened after various bird species, these spacious nests offer a unique Tree House Resort experience with live tree branches running through it. Fitted with all mod cons, and an earthen decor, makes sure that guests enjoy a serene welcome to the magnanimity of nature. new year packages 2016 , these nests include large patios and private gardens also. Rating:
